common.model

Class AbstractContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.model.AbstractType
      • common.model.AbstractSquare
        • common.model.AbstractContainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICopy, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ReleaseSquare, Square

    public abstract class AbstractContainer
extends AbstractSquare
implements java.io.Serializable
    Defines a subclass of AbstractSquares which can contain Tile Objects.
    Author:
    Nicholas Panzarino, jasirocki - jdoc
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
